attributes.action: get fuel prices back under 100 pence per litre for both petrol and diesel.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My car has jumped from costing me 50 pounds to fill from empty up to nearly 70 pounds in a year. If  I get 400 miles out of that tank it will cost me an extra 500 pounds a year to do an under average, 10000 miles per annum, and this is just me. How much extra is this costing the nation as a whole??

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
